details.arabic_diacless: رب اغفر لى وهب لى ملكا لا ينۢبغى لاحد منۢ بعدى‌ۚ انك انت الوهاب‏
details.arabic: رَبِّ اغۡفِرۡ لِىۡ وَهَبۡ لِىۡ مُلۡكًا لَّا يَنۡۢبَغِىۡ لِاَحَدٍ مِّنۡۢ بَعۡدِىۡ‌ۚ اِنَّكَ اَنۡتَ الۡوَهَّابُ‏
details.transliteration: rabbi ighfir lee wahab leemulkan la yanbaghee li-ahadin min baAAdee innakaanta alwahhab
details.translations: My Lord, forgive me and grant me a kingdom such as will not belong to anyone after me. Indeed, You are the Bestower.
